properties.name: spring.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token signing

properties.name: spring.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: spring.security.jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: management.endpoints.web.exposure.include
properties.description: List of actuator endpoints to expose
